name: v2
description: **Foundry is a blazing fast, portable and modular toolkit for Ethereum application development written in Rust.**

scripts.lint: npx eslint . --ignore-pattern coverage/ --ignore-pattern coverage.json --ignore-pattern lib/ --ignore-pattern out --ignore-pattern cache_forge/
scripts.lint:fix: npx eslint . --fix --ignore-pattern coverage/ --ignore-pattern coverage.json --ignore-pattern lib/ --ignore-pattern out --ignore-pattern cache_forge/
